post.author: na
post.content:
I am updating company's web site.
All the title of the web site are image files.
However, I couldn't figure out which font it is, no way to connect the web solution company which initially created the web.
I only have gif format of images. How can I find out font and character info from gif image?  Is it possible?
Since every title and sub titles are image, search engines can't catch the content, is there any way to search engines catch the content by adding some comment or so ?
post.title: about web site project
